title: CUBE
author: Unknown
pages:
CUBE is a 1997
Canadian
psychological sci-fi
horror film. At least 7
prisoners are put into
this maze of CUBES
(fun fact: all are
named after prisons
which reflect their
character), where
several rooms are
booby-trapped with
spikes, lazers, acid,
and a whole lot more.
The film is fantastic,
from what I've heard,
and it really plays on
the human psyche and
how, when people are
put into a nightmare
situation, they can be
driven to absolute
madess. Yipes. The film
has both a sequel and
a prequel, and I highly
recommend it.

(Fun Fact: The entire
film was filmed in only
one cube)
